content:
You're almost ready to hit the trails! I'm happy to help you find a great coffee shop in Gatlinburg to fuel up before your hike.

Gatlinburg has plenty of coffee shops to choose from, but here are a few recommendations:

1. **The Coffee Loft:** Located in the heart of Gatlinburg, this cozy coffee shop serves up a variety of specialty coffee drinks, including lattes, cappuccinos, and mochas.
2. **Bennett's Coffee Roasters:** This local roastery offers a wide selection of single-origin and blended coffees, as well as delicious pastries and breakfast items.
3. **The Village Coffee House:** This charming coffee shop is located in the Village Shops of Gatlinburg and serves up a variety of coffee drinks, tea, and hot chocolate, along with sandwiches and baked goods.
4. **Donut Friar Coffee:** Yes, the same Donut Friar I mentioned earlier! They also serve a mean cup of coffee to go with their famous donuts.

All of these coffee shops are within a short drive from Newfound Gap, so you can grab a cup of coffee and head out to the trailhead.

I hope this helps, and I'm sure you'll enjoy your coffee and your hike to Charlies Bunion!
